results.overview: In the midst of a nasty public breakup of married movie stars, a studio publicist scrambles to put a cap on the escalating situation as the couple's latest film has found it's only print kidnapped by the director.
results.title: America's Sweethearts

results.original_title: Nelson and Jeanette: America's Singing Sweethearts
results.overview: A look at the screen triumphs and private lives of the screen's number-one singing team.
results.title: Nelson and Jeanette: America's Singing Sweethearts

results.overview: This digitally remastered collection contains Betty Boop's all-time favorite cartoons from the 1930s. You'll find this cutie as charming and funny as ever! It's easy to see why Betty Boop was, and still is, referred to as America's Sweetheart.
results.title: Betty Boop: America's Sweetheart

results.overview: Born in Texas and raised in Augusta, Georgia – Billy Anderson is stand-up comedian currently living in Seattle, Washington.
results.title: Billy Anderson: America's Sweetheart
